text: Saint-Légier-La Chiésaz was a municipality in Riviera-Pays-d'Enhaut in the canton of Vaud in Switzerland. On 1 January 2022, the former municipalities of Blonay and Saint-Légier-La Chiésaz merged to form the new municipality of Blonay – Saint-Légier. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Former municipalities of Vaud
title: Saint-Légier-La Chiésaz
